title: Big Tech's $400 Billion AI Spending Spree Drives Valuations to New Highs
text: Microsoft joined Nvidia in the $4 trillion market cap club, while Meta is closing in on the $2 trillion mark.

title: I wanted the markets to be defined by huge earnings reports from Microsoft and Meta, says Jim Cramer
text: 'Mad Money' host Jim Cramer the earnings we got out of Big Tech and how they impacted the markets.

title: Tech Giants Report: AMZN Stumbles, AAPL Impresses, META Surprises, MSFT Soars
text: Amazon's (AMZN) earnings came in mixed, with cloud growth underwhelming and capacity issues weighing on the stock. Meanwhile, advertising revenue growth of over 20% was a bright spot, aligning with strong digital ad numbers from Meta (META) and Alphabet (GOOGL).

title: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Align Technology Stock Tumbles; eBay, Meta Soar
text: Major U.S. equity indexes moved lower on Thursday after the latest Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) data showed inflation accelerated in June, offsetting strong Big Tech earnings. Several economists attributed the higher-than-expected reading for the PCE, the Federal Reserve's preferred inflation gauge, to tariff pressures.

title: 4 Highly Rated Dividend Picks Among Nasdaq's Best in 2026
text: Dividend stocks are known for their cash flow and stability. However, if you want a dividend stock that can beat the market, you may have to sacrifice a high yield.

title: Stellar Earnings as AI Investment Accelerates
text: PCE inflation heats up

title: Inside Meta's Q2 Earnings: Ad System Upgrades And WhatsApp Fuel Growth
text: Meta delivered a standout Q2 with 22% YoY revenue growth, beating forecasts despite tariff concerns and advertiser fickleness. Ad system innovations—Andrometa, GEM, and Lattice—drove higher conversion rates, fueling a 9% increase in average ad prices. WhatsApp and Threads monetization is gaining traction, with WhatsApp's paid messaging and Meta Verified subscriptions driving strong 'Other Revenue' growth.

title: Meta Platforms (META) Reports Q2 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
text: Although the revenue and EPS for Meta Platforms (META) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

title: Why Meta Platforms Stock Is Skyrocketing Today
text: Shares of Meta Platforms (META 11.05%) are flying higher on Thursday, up 12.2% as of 2:53 p.m. ET. Today's jump comes as the S&P 500 was flat and the Nasdaq Composite gained 0.3%.

title: Meta: Strong Ads Growth Doesn't Change Our Thesis
text: Meta Platforms, Inc. delivered a stellar quarter with strong ad performance, especially in Asia-Pacific and Rest of World, driving double-digit after-hours share price growth. Despite impressive user and revenue growth, Meta's massive spending—particularly in Reality Labs—continues to weigh heavily on margins and cash flow. Much of Meta's revenue growth is driven by raising ad prices, a strategy that may not be sustainable long-term and could hinder future earnings growth.

title: Tech giants are ramping up AI spending and debt loads
text: CNBC's Kristina Partsinevelos joins 'Money Movers' to discuss the AI race shifting to credit markets.

title: Meta Platforms' Q2 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates, Rise Y/Y
text: META's second-quarter 2025 performance benefits from higher advertising revenues, expanding AI integration and a strong user base.

title: Top Stock Movers Now: Microsoft, Meta Platforms, Carvana, and More
text: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq traded at record highs at midday, boosted by tech earnings news. The  Dow Jones Industrial Average was little changed.

title: Mark Zuckerberg keeps talking about “superintelligence.” Meta's stock is soaring for a less exciting reason
text: Meta Platforms released blockbuster second-quarter earnings on Wednesday, July 30. While we'll dive into the 22% year-over-year (YOY) revenue jump, we're somewhat stuck on CEO Mark Zuckerberg's increasing fixation with the almost immaterial idea of “superintelligence.

title: Is Meta's Superintelligence The Next Metaverse? Rating Downgrade
text: Meta delivered stellar Q2 earnings, beating expectations with strong revenue and ad growth, driving the stock up over 12% at market open on Thursday. I am downgrading Meta to Hold due to limited near-term catalysts, rising infrastructure and AI talent costs, and increasing competitive pressures. Long-term AI monetization potential remains intact, with Meta aggressively investing in AI-driven ad tools and user engagement to defend market share.

title: Meta, Microsoft Spark $500B Rally in AI Leaders and ETFs
text: META's and Microsoft's blowout earnings triggered a $500B surge in AI stocks and ETFs like WTAI, IVES and others.

title: Microsoft and Meta are pushing the stock market into even more overbought territory
text: Bullish investors defy the evidence. Apple and Amazon could be a reality check.

title: Meta Stock Skyrockets To Record High After Strong Q2 Earnings
text: Shares of Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META) are higher this morning, after the social media giant reported adjusted second-quarter earnings of $7.14 per share on $47.52 in revenue, both of which were stronger than expected.

title: Meta Jumps on Q2 Earnings Beat: ETFs to Tap
text: META's Q2 beat and massive stock surge lift ETFs like VOX, FCOM, IXP and XLC, each with heavy exposure to the tech giant.

title: Microsoft and Meta stocks should be treated like utilities
text: Growth rates won't be sustainable forever; it's time to rethink Meta, Microsoft and other top tech stocks. Ahmed Riesgo, Chief Investment Officer at Insigneo, explains why you “definitely' want to own them now.

text: Jason Helfstein, Oppenheimer analyst, joins CNBC's 'Squawk on the Street' to discuss outlooks on tech stocks, expectations for earnings, and much more.

text: CEO Mark Zuckerberg wants to make “personal superintelligence” available to everyone.

text: So far this year, one of the better performers among the Magnificent 7 has been Meta Platforms Inc.

title: Meta, Microsoft And Google Are Unleashing A $250 Billion AI Tsunami
text: The AI revolution is officially a $240 billion spending spree. Meta Platforms Inc META, Microsoft Corp MSFT and Alphabet Inc‘s GOOGL GOOG Google are pouring unprecedented capital into AI infrastructure, igniting what Wedbush analyst Dan Ives calls a “watershed moment” for technology.

title: Microsoft and Meta Show Big Tech Is Eating the Markets, the Economy, and the World
text: Microsoft's market capitalization climbed past the $4 trillion mark on Thursday morning.

title: Meta Blasts Up 11% on Q2 Results—The AI Train Keeps Chugging
text: Magnificent Seven stock Meta Platforms NASDAQ: META just reported its much-anticipated Q2 financial results. In no uncertain terms, Meta absolutely smashed expectations.

title: SPX, NDX Notch New All-Time Highs with MSFT & META Leading the Way
text: Alex Coffey says the start of Thursday's trading is an "interesting start" as both the S&P 500 (SPX) and Nasdaq-100 (NDX) reach new all-time highs. He expands on his initial thought saying strength in Microsoft (MSFT) and Meta (META) are lifting the indices based off of market cap size.

title: Meta, Microsoft roar higher on strong earnings as AI spending booms
text: Shares of Meta and Microsoft popped after reporting strong earnings that beat analysts' expectations. Meta and Microsoft have been investing heavily in AI infrastructure in recent years, and they will continue to shell out billions in capital expenditures.

title: MSFT Azure "Driving Force" in Earnings, META "Nothing Not to Like"
text: Microsoft (MSFT) rallies on strong cloud growth from its Azure unit as the company is poised to trade at new all-time highs Thursday. Jenny Horne dives into the Mag 7 member's better-than-expected earnings numbers and what's fueling the positive trading reaction.

title: Meta: Q2 Earnings Likely Just The Opening Act Of A Bull Run
text: I don't expect to see Meta Platforms, Inc. trading below $750 anytime soon. Any pullback to this level could be a decent entry point for institutional funds that are uninvested. Meta's growth is relentless. Q2 DAUs hit 3.4 billion, and the family of apps' ad revenue is up 21% YOY, driven by improvements in AI recommendation algorithms. Meta raised FY 2025 CapEx lower range by $2B to $66B. The midpoint of the guidance represents a $30B YOY increase. The AI narrative remains intact.

title: Q2 Ad Surge Fuels Meta Platforms's Ambitious AI ‘Superintelligence'
text: Key Points in This Article: Meta Platforms‘ (META) Q2 revenue reached $47.5 billion, with ad revenue up 21% to $46.5 billion, driving a 36% net income increase to $18.3 billion.

title: Nasdaq 100 and S&P500: Tech Stocks Rally Today on Microsoft and Meta Forecast
text: Tech stocks surge premarket as Microsoft and Meta beat earnings forecasts. S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 futures rally despite Fed inflation concerns today.

title: Meta's growth strikes Wall Street as incomprehensibly strong, and the stock rockets
text: If the company's core business continues growing at the current rate and its Superintelligence efforts gain traction, “there's no telling what the ceiling is for Meta,” Bernstein analysts said.

title: Meta's AI Isn't Just Smart — It's Paying The Bills
text: Meta Platforms Inc META just dropped a blowout second quarter — but the real headline isn't the numbers, it's the algorithm. According to JPMorgan's Doug Anmuth, Meta's AI isn't just writing code or generating Llama buzz.

title: Meta's Q2 Beat Was Just A Warm-Up Thanks To Game-Changing AI Investments
text: Meta Platforms, Inc. crushed its Q2 earnings, and what it said about AI might matter even more than the revenue headline. The company's AI capex plan isn't just ambitious — it's a bet that could redefine how personal tech works. User engagement and ad revenue are both climbing fast. Coincidence? Or is Meta quietly winning the AI monetization game?

title: META Stock To $1,500?
text: Meta stock (NASDAQ:META) has already achieved remarkable gains, growing 2x from $370 levels in early 2024 to approximately $780 at present. But what could drive the stock to double from its current levels over the coming years?

title: JEPQ: Volatility Collapses Post Microsoft, Meta Earnings (Rating Downgrade)
text: Implied volatility fell sharply after Microsoft and Meta reported earnings. Bearish seasonal trends lie ahead for big-cap tech stocks. Patience may be the prudent and appropriate play heading into the end of Q3.

title: MSFT, META Lead Nasdaq Rally; FOMC Fallout and Fed's Next Steps
text: Sam Vadas and Diane King Hall kick off Thursday's coverage from the NYSE as investors react to two huge earnings beats from Microsoft (MSFT) and Meta (META). Microsoft's surge has the company on track to surpass a $4 trillion market cap valuation.

title: Nasdaq set for rip-roaring start as Meta and Microsoft blow past earnings forecasts
text: Wall Street is set for a rip-roaring start on Thursday, following earnings from Microsoft and Meta overnight that both smashed past expectations.   Led by an 11% premarket gain for the Instagram owner and 8% for the Windows operating system developer, Nasdaq 100 futures were up 1.2% and the S&P 500 rose 0.8%, while Dow Jones futures are up 0.2%.

title: Meta's Billion-Dollar Bet On Superintelligence
text: Meta delivered record Q2 results, with revenue up 22%, expanding margins, and robust free cash flow driven by AI-powered ad optimization. Zuckerberg's bold vision is to build AGI, with Meta Superintelligence Labs and a next-gen supercomputer launching in 2026 to power future AI advances. Meta's aggressive AI investments carry risks—competition, regulatory hurdles, and uncertain AGI monetization—but its scale and assets are unmatched.

title: Meta Platforms: AI spending spree and why advertising is still the Silicon Valley giant's bedrock
text: Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META, ETR:FB2A, SWX:FB) delivered a blockbuster earnings report overnight, sending its shares more than 10% higher in after-hours trading on Wall Street. For UK investors, this is worth noting: Meta is a core holding for many tech-focused investment trusts and exchange-traded funds, and sits in countless ISAs and SIPPs.

title: Thomas: Results from Microsoft and Meta show AI adoption is accelerating fast
text: Lisa Thomas, Deputy Head of Global Research at TD Cowen, tells Worldwide Exchange that Meta and Microsoft's strong results signal a broader AI-driven tech shift, lifting price targets and confidence.

title: Wall Street updates META stock price target after earnings
text: Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META) is up 12.05% at press time after delivering second-quarter results Wednesday, after the bell that blew past Wall Street's expectations and triggered a wave of analyst upgrades.

title: Wall St futures hit record peaks as Meta, Microsoft results get AI boost
text: Futures tied to the S&P 500 and Nasdaq surged to record highs on Thursday after strong earnings from tech giants Meta and Microsoft reinforced investor confidence that artificial intelligence investments are paying off.

title: Meta: Path To A $1,000
text: Meta delivered strong Q2 results, beating earnings and revenue estimates, due to robust digital ad market growth and user expansion. Meta's free cash flow remained exceptional, despite a temporary dip, due to aggressive AI and Data Center CapEx investments, positioning Meta for future growth. The company is accelerating its AI growth strategy by developing 'personal superintelligence', an AI-driven tool to boost productivity and creativity.

title: Meta and Microsoft Keep Their License to Spend
text: Strong performance of core businesses gives cover to blowout AI investments—for now.

title: The Day Ahead: Markets Eye PCE, Microsoft and Meta Fuel Tech Rally Today
text: Tech earnings and inflation data drive markets today, with traders eyeing PCE, Fed signals, and Apple and Amazon results after the close.

title: Meta, Microsoft shares surge on Q2 profit beats
text: Meta ups its guidance on the back of a Q2 profits beat while Microsoft outperforms, growing revenue at its fastest pace in three years. In aviation news, Airbus confirms its delivery targets for the year despite engine supply delays from Pratt & Whitney.

title: Meta stock surges after Q2 results blow past expectations despite heavy AI spending
text: Meta's artificial intelligence spending spree appears to be paying off with investors, who sent the company's stock soaring after hours on Wednesday following a blowout quarterly earnings report.
